title: Home Networking
desc: Unlock your WiFi potential with ultimate speed and coverage.

subData.subTitle: Nighthawk X10 – AD7200 802.11ac/ad MU-MIMO with Plex Media Server (R9000)
subData.subDesc: Nighthawk X10 AD7200 is one of industry’s fastest router for media streaming with Plex media server. With 802.11ac and 802.11ad WiFi technology, the X10 delivers ultra-smooth 4K streaming, VR gaming and instant downloads.

subData.subTitle: Orbi Home WiFi System: AC2200 Tri-Band. Up to 3,500sqft of WiFi Coverage (RBK30)
subData.subDesc: From your front door to your patio, get super strong WiFi in every inch of your home. This WiFi Systems provides up to 3,500 square feet of coverage.

subData.subTitle: Orbi Home WiFi System: AC2200 Tri-Band. Up to 4,000sqft of WiFi Coverage (RBK40)
subData.subDesc: From your front door to your patio, get super strong WiFi in every inch of your home. This WiFi Systems provides up to 4,000 square feet of coverage.

subData.subTitle: Orbi Home WiFi System: AC3000 Tri-Band. Up to 5,000sqft of WiFi Coverage (RBK50)
subData.subDesc: From your front door to your patio, get super strong WiFi in every inch of your home. This WiFi Systems provides up to 5,000 square feet of coverage.

subData.subTitle: ReadyNAS 2-bay Network Attached Storage (RN42200)
subData.subDesc: ReadyNAS 422 enables all the features a smart and modern business is looking for in a single, compact solution: file storage, file sharing, automatic on-premise, off-premise or cloud backup and recovery and full data protection.

title: Business Networking
desc: The Arlo family of smart security cameras lets you watch over what you love from every angle, indoors and out, day and night.

subData.subTitle: 8-Port Gigabit Ethernet Unmanaged Switch (GS108)
subData.subDesc: The NETGEAR Gigabit Unmanaged Switch series helps businesses cost-effectively expand their network to Gigabit speeds and higher port counts.

subData.subTitle: 5-Port with 4-Port PoE Gigabit Ethernet Unmanaged Switch (GS305P)
subData.subDesc: The GS305P with Power-over-Ethernet (PoE) provides power and data from a single Ethernet (CAT-5) cable to devices such as IP cameras, VoIP/Internet-based phones, wireless access points, etc.

subData.subTitle: 48-Port Gigabit Ethernet Rackmount Network Business Essentials Switch (GS348)
subData.subDesc: NETGEAR GS348 Gigabit Ethernet Unmanaged Switch provides easy, reliable, and affordable network connectivity for home and small offices

subData.subTitle: 8-Port PoE+ Gigabit Ethernet Smart Managed Switch (GS510TLP)
subData.subDesc: The GS510TLP 8-Port Gigabit Smart Managed Switch with PoE+ and 2 SFP Ports joins the NETGEAR Standalone Smart Managed Switches family, adding full 8 port PoE+ support for deployment of modern high-power PoE devices.

subData.subTitle: 48-Port 10-Gigabit Smart Managed Pro Switch (XS748T)
subData.subDesc: The 10G Smart Managed Switches provide comprehensive L2+/Layer 3 Lite features in order to meet current and future needs on virtualization, converged networking and mobility.

subData.subTitle: AC WiFi Business Access Point with NETGEAR Insight app (WAC510)
subData.subDesc: The NETGEAR AC WiFi Business Access Point WAC510 delivers high performance with high client density for enterprises requiring ubiquitous and reliable wireless for all business applications.

subData.subTitle: ReadyNAS 2-bay Network Attached Storage (RN42200)
subData.subDesc: ReadyNAS 422 enables all the features a smart and modern business is looking for in a single, compact solution: file storage, file sharing, automatic on-premise, off-premise or cloud backup and recovery and full data protection.

subData.subTitle: ReadyNAS 6-Bay Network Attached Storage 2x10GbE (RN526X00)
subData.subDesc: The high-end, high performance NAS based on Intel Dual Core Server Processor has built-in dual 10Gig Ethernet ports and is the ideal professional desktop NAS system for small and medium size businesses.

subData.subTitle: ReadyNAS 6-Bay Network Attached Storage 2x10GbE + 2x1GbE (RN626X00)
subData.subDesc: ReadyNAS 626X delivers up to 20Gigabit per second throughput for file serving, offers backup, disaster recovery, and cloud options. It is the best-of-breed solution for modern small businesses.

subData.subTitle: ReadyNAS 12-Bay Network Attached Storage 2x10Gbase-T 2U Rackmount (RR4312X0)
subData.subDesc: High performance 2U Rackmount NAS for backup, file-serving, collaboration and virtualization environments with dual 10GbE included.

title: Security and Surveillance
desc: Experience the highest performing and secure storage.

subData.subTitle: Arlo Pro Security System with Siren – 3 Rechargeable Wire-Free HD Cameras (VMS4330)
subData.subDesc: Arlo Pro wire-free security cameras let you watch over what you love from every angle, indoors and out, day and night
